physdesc.extent: 56 maps and other images on 1 DVD-R

did.abstract: Maps of Oakland and Livingston Counties and Detroit, Mich., and the state of Michigan, and other items relating to Bloomfield Township, Mich., photographed from the holdings of the Burton Historical Collection, Detroit Public Library.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Carroll DeWeese (donor 10363), in 2010.

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: The collection was photographed from originals held by the Burton Historical Collection, Detroit Public Library. Photo images are copyright by Carroll DeWeese. Permission is given for legitimate personal, non-profit, museum, library, and research use and distribution of the photo images. Commercial and for profit uses of the photo images require permission from Carroll DeWeese. Photo credit is "Carroll DeWeese."

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Carroll DeWeese digital map collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Carroll DeWeese is a Birmingham, Mich., photographer.

scopecontent.p: This collection of maps and other items was photographed from the holdings of the Burton Historical Collection, Detroit Public Library, May 5, 2010. Five items or groups of items were photographed.

controlaccess.head: Contributors:
controlaccess.persname: Hess, F. Map of Oakland County, Michigan.
Hubbard, Bela, 1814-1896. Michigan maps. Vol.8, Oakland and Livingston Counties.

did.unittitle: Burton Historical Collection maps on DVD-R

scopecontent.p: Map of Oakland County, Michigan, 1857. Published by S.H. Burhans; Surveyor F. Hess; Large Wall Map (5 feet wide by 6 feet tall) stored in the archives as three 2'x6' strips. Burton Historical Collection call number 977.402 [1857] H46

did.unittitle: 1857 Oakland Map Bottom.jpg [southern tier of townships, Pontiac, and vignettes]
1857 Oakland Map Middle.jpg [townships 2-4 north, town plats, and vignettes]
1857 Oakland Map Top.jpg [part of townships 4 north, townships 5 north, town plats, and vignettes]

scopecontent.p: Plat of Reader, Jerome & Duffield's Subdivision, 1879. Street and lot plat in two (2) pages. One page is somewhat stained on the top portion. The second page is in excellent condition. This subdivision is in the Springwells area of southwest Detroit. Burton Historical Collection call number 977.4D4 1879 M92 (Rare Map)
Michigan , 1882. Geo. F. Cram, Engraver & Publisher; copyright secured 1882; Single page color map of Michigan -- both Lower and Upper Peninsulas (approx. 15"x18")

Auction Sale -- Monday, Aug. 28th 1911, Hupp Stock Farms, On Maple Ave. -- one mile west of Birmingham . This is a notice of an estate sale for the Hupp Farm which was soon to be developed into the Bloomfield Village Subdivisions by Judson Bradway. 95 separate items to be auctioned are listed. Burton Historical Collection call number 099.7745 B53 D4

"The Covert," Article from The Afterglow , Vol. 2, Issue 8-9, Aug/Sep 1926, pages 5, 6, 7, and 27. The "Covert" was the name given by the Hendrie sisters to what is now known as the Barton House in Bloomfield Township. The Afterglow was monthly Magazine about life in the Birmingham Bloomfield area published for the years 1925--1927.

Michigan Maps -- Bela Hubbard, 1838-1841, Vol. 8, Oakland and Livingston Counties. Each township in the two counties is drawn on a separate sheet (approx 12"x12") and loosely bound in book. These are the original maps drawn by Surveyor Bela Hubbard, and show land forms and vegetation. Burton Historical Collection call number 977.4 [1838-1841] H86 V.8
